metadata.title: CVE-2020-22674 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in gpac 0.8.0. An invalid memory dereference exists in the function FixTrackID located in isom_intern.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
